long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Detect and mark phishing websites to stay safe online.

How to use BatSheild?
1. When you open a web page, BatSheild will automatically prompt you whether the website is safe, without requiring any action from you.

2. You can also mark a site as safe or unsafe by using BatSheild. You may need to connect your wallet, and you might be rewarded for doing this.What you do may help more people avoid being deceived by phishing websites. Everyone works together to create a secure network environment.
